tool_description: Get global city, region, and country data. Filter and display results in multiple languages.
name: GeoDB Cities
title: GeoDB Cities

api_list.name: Place Distance
api_list.description: Gets this place's distance to the given place.

optional_parameters.name: toPlaceId
optional_parameters.description: The distance to this place

optional_parameters.name: distanceUnit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of distance: KM | MI [default]

api_list.name: Place Time
api_list.description: Get this place's current time in ISO-8601 format: HHmmss.SSSZ

api_list.name: Place Date-Time
api_list.description: Get this place's current date-time in ISO-6801 format: yyyyMMdd'T'HHmmssZ

api_list.name: Place Located In
api_list.description:
Get the details for the containing populated place (e.g., its county or other administrative division), including location coordinates, population, and elevation above sea-level  (if available). 

Currently, this data is highly dependent on whether the Wikidata **locatedIn** relation is properly defined. If you see an issue, please propose a change to the corresponding Wikidata entry.

api_list.name: Place Details
api_list.description: Get the details for a specific place, including location coordinates, population, and elevation above sea-level (if available).

optional_parameters.name: asciiMode
optional_parameters.description: Display results using ASCII characters

optional_parameters.name: languageCode
optional_parameters.description: Display results in this language

api_list.name: City Date-Time
api_list.description: Get the city current date-time in ISO-6801 format: yyyyMMdd'T'HHmmssZ

required_parameters.name: cityid
required_parameters.description: The city id (either native id or wikiDataId)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wft-geo-db.p.rapidapi.com/v1/geo/cities/Q60/dateTime"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wft-geo-db.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wft-geo-db.p.rapidapi.com/v1/geo/cities/{cityid}/dateTime"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wft-geo-db.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: City Located In
api_list.description:
Get the details for the containing populated place (e.g., its county or other administrative division), including location coordinates, population, and elevation above sea-level  (if available). 

Currently, this data is highly dependent on whether the Wikidata **locatedIn** relation is properly defined. If you see an issue, please propose a change to the corresponding Wikidata entry.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wft-geo-db.p.rapidapi.com/v1/geo/cities/Q65/locatedIn"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wft-geo-db.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wft-geo-db.p.rapidapi.com/v1/geo/cities/{cityid}/locatedIn"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wft-geo-db.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Cities
api_list.description: Find cities, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all known cities with a population of at least 1000.

optional_parameters.name: countryIds
optional_parameters.description: Only cities in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData ids)

optional_parameters.name: types
optional_parameters.description: Only cities for these types (comma-delimited): CITY | ADM2

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The zero-ary offset into the results

optional_parameters.name: maxPopulation
optional_parameters.description: Only cities having no more than this population

optional_parameters.name: namePrefix
optional_parameters.description: Only cities whose names start with this prefix. If languageCode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name as it appears in that language.

optional_parameters.name: namePrefixDefaultLangResults
optional_parameters.description: When name-prefix matching, whether or not to match on names in the default language if a non-default language is requested.

optional_parameters.name: includeDeleted
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include any cities marked deleted: ALL | SINCE_YESTERDAY | SINCE_LAST_WEEK | NONE

optional_parameters.name: hateoasMode
optional_parameters.description: Include HATEOAS-style links in results

optional_parameters.name: excludedCountryIds
optional_parameters.description: Only cities NOT in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData ids)

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: How to sort the results. Format: ±SORT_FIELD,±SORT_FIELD where SORT_FIELD = countryCode | elevation | name | population

optional_parameters.name: timeZoneIds
optional_parameters.description: Only cities in these time-zones

optional_parameters.name: distanceUnit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of distance to use: MI | KM

optional_parameters.name: minPopulation
optional_parameters.description: Only cities having at least this population

optional_parameters.name: asciiMode
optional_parameters.description: Display results using ASCII characters

optional_parameters.name: languageCode
optional_parameters.description: Display results in this language

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: The location radius within which to find cities

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Only cities near this location. Latitude/longitude in ISO-6709 format: ±DD.DDDD±DDD.DDDD

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve

optional_parameters.name: sort

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wft-geo-db.p.rapidapi.com/v1/locale/timezones/America__Los_Angeles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wft-geo-db.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

optional_parameters.description: Only divisions having at least this population
